Title: Cosmos "Barberry" vulnerability in github.com/cosmos/cosmos-sdk
Description: The cosmos-sdk module is affected by the vulnerability codenamed "Barberry".
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 0.46.0 before 0.46.13, all versions starting from 0.47.0 before 0.47.3
NotImpacted: All versions before 0.46.0, all versions starting from 0.46.13 before 0.47.0, all versions starting from 0.47.3
